00020 // Force calculation function
00021 geometry_msgs::Vector3 Gravity::getForce()
00022 {
00023         double Reb[9];
00024         quat2rotmtx(parentObj->states.pose.orientation,Reb);
00025         g = parentObj->environment.gravity;
00026         geometry_msgs::Vector3 gravVect;
00027         gravVect.z = parentObj->kinematics.mass*g;
00028         wrenchGrav.force = Reb/gravVect;
00029 
00030         // Printouts
00031         // std::cout << wrenchGrav.force.x << " ";
00032 
00033         return wrenchGrav.force;
00034 }
00035 
00036 // Torque calculation function
00037 geometry_msgs::Vector3 Gravity::getTorque()
00038 {
00039         // Gravity does not generate torque around the CG
00040         return wrenchGrav.torque;
00041 }
